attributes.action: Award an extra 10% to student exams and assignments during COVID 19 pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: All university students to be awarded an additional 10% towards their marks for exams and assignments during the COVID 19 pandemic - The severe shortage of, and absence of interactive face to face learning, along with social isolation and a lack of peer support - all create poor academic outcomes.
attributes.background: All university students to be awarded an additional 10% towards their marks for exams and assignments during the COVID 19 pandemic - The severe shortage of, and absence of interactive face to face learning, along with social isolation and a lack of peer support - all create poor academic outcomes.

rejection.details: The grading of university students is a matter for individual universities, which are independent institutions, not the Government or House of Commons.
